name: Don't Starve: Hamlet
summary: In Don’t Starve: Hamlet, Wilson discovers a lost town of aristocratic Pigmen nestled within a foreboding tropical jungle. Reacquaint to city life with pig shops, houses, new items, biomes and more, or delve into the ancient pig ruins and try your hand at treasure hunting in this new single player expansion.
info:
• 中文名: 饥荒：村落
  • 开发: Klei Entertainment
  • 游戏类型: 生存
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018-11-08
